command_group: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing contact
description: Manage a Marketplace Offer listing's contacts.

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing contact add
commands.summary: Add a contact to a marketplace offer listing.
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer listing contact add --offer-id
                                                       --type
                                                       [--add]
                                                       [--email]
                                                       [--force-string]
                                                       [--name]
                                                       [--phone]
                                                       [--remove]
                                                       [--set]
                                                       [--uri]
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing contact add --offer-id MyOfferId --type Engineering

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing contact delete
commands.summary: Delete a contact to a marketplace offer listing.
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer listing contact delete --offer-id
                                                          --type
                                                          [--email]
                                                          [--name]
                                                          [--phone]
                                                          [--uri]
                                                          [--yes]
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing contact delete --offer-id MyOfferId --type Engineering

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing contact list
commands.summary: List the contacts for a marketplace offer listing.
commands.syntax: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing contact list --offer-id
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing contact list --offer-id MyOfferId
